message.body: Hey martha. Been thinkin. Its hard for me to treat this whole thing as a secret because i dont want Katie to think i chose a side or that i betrayed her trust in any way when she does find out. So i beg you to tell her soon. Its only as big of a deal as you guys make it. :-)
I can offer my assurance that I'm doing my best to be respectful to you and yours and me.

This is a text from Sofie that I just got: Hey martha. Been thinkin. Its hard for me to treat this whole thing as a secret because i dont want Katie to think i chose a side or that i betrayed her trust in any way when she does find out. So i beg you to tell her soon. Its only as big of a deal as you guys make it. :-)
Sorry! Meant for you know who.
I figured. :-) are you giving it to him to talk bad of me?
No no no no. Giving it to him bc its his responsibility as much as mine to handle the situation
I can't carry the burden alone. And it's all his fault anyway. ;)
Thats what i hoped. :-) i didnt mean to be dramatic i just want the best for everyone
I completely agree and understand. Im very aware of all the complicated feelings involved.
Let me know if you know need anything.
I will. Thanks for everything sof. And sorry again for the text confusion. I respect your opinion greatly.
Not a problem. I know you do. Just needed to make sure. You know how this world can trick you.
